headline: Norfolk Southern board chair Mongeau resigns

headline: Claude Mongeau resigns as chair of Norfolk Southern Board
summary: Norfolk Southern Corporation (NYSE: NSC) today announced Chairman Claude Mongeau has resigned from the Board of Directors this week for personal reasons. The board will elect a new chair at its next scheduled meeting later this month.
